text: The Sorcerers of Araby who dwell near the sea are adept at manipulating the Wind of Ghyran and taming Sea Nymphs.
The Sorcerers of the desert have their own magical tradition and are able to manipulate many of the Winds of Magic.
Some Arabyan Sorcerers have mastered a technique to control Fire Efreets, and have learned to control the Wind of Aqshy along the way.
Tempest Djinns and the Wind of Azyr are the powerful allies of these Arabyan Sorcerers.
The arabyan cities hide all kinds of dangers in their shadows. The assassins of this land are renowned for their skill, wiping out their targets in swift, stealthy attacks.
The Emirs are warriors without equal, who are promoted for their worth, serving as bodyguards for most important leaders of Araby.
